author: pedrouid
content: question: are we trying to move into a REST API instead of a JSON-RPC API or is the API being written in REST but there will be an equivalent JSON-RPC API?

author: mpetrunic
content: We are moving into REST API

author: mpetrunic
content: Nothing stops client to expose json-rpc/grpc/graphql in addition to rest api

author: pedrouid
content: it would be good to define a pattern where spec can be written in REST and easily translated to JSON-RPC

author: pedrouid
content: for example if an endpoint is `GET /node/syncing/` it would be assumed to have method `node_syncing` with params `[]`

author: mpetrunic
content: https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-APIs/issues/37 if you would like to take a look and comment on proposal for rest of endpoints
